info.name: Rai TV Dirette Senza Pubblicità (By Atino Core)
info.description:
Rai TV Dirette senza Banner Pubblicitari, links, social, etc... solo tv, canali e guida TV. Other Styles: [see all]
■ - Yahoo! Mail Minimal ■ - Yahoo! Mail Minimal Zero ■ - Yahoo! Mail Zero Carbonella ■ - Yahoo! Mail Minimal One ■ - LIBERO Mail ZERO ■ - LIBERO Mail ZERO CARBONELLA ■ - Speed Test OOKLA cleaner ■ - LA7 Essenziale Forte
info.additionalInfo: May 2015. Tested on FireFox and Chrome (with or without AdBlock) works fine. This version displays TV Screen, guide & Channels . no advertising box, no site-bar, no logo, no navigation tabs. suitable for your tablets, notebooks and netbooks, for an easy and clear RAI TV Streaming . PLEASE Report any problems or suggestions here. thanks. PS: this script does not remove the pre-stream advertising ..use AdBlock to(o)! ...see also: MY OTHER STYLES
